description: The video version of our Age of Sigmar 4.0 Rules Review is ready for all your listening goodness.
title: New Goonhammer Video: The Age of Sigmar 4th Edition Rules Review

description: This weekend marks another major step toward the end of Third Edition. Skaventide is going up for Preorder and the Indexes won’t be too far behind. There are a few events left trying to get the most out of the edition before it shuts down for good so we got two events in the United […]
title: Competitive Innovations in the Mortal Realms: First One In, Last One Out

description: About 18 months ago I returned to Warhammer after a twenty year break, and this box set was the first thing I bought.  I’ve bought and built it three times now, and each time was an absolute pleasure.  I almost find myself wanting to get another one, despite not needing it for the table top, […]
title: Age of Sigmar Fourth Edition – Maggotkin of Nurgle Spearhead

description: Over the years the Goonhammer crew have put together a vast and expansive library of painting guides. Appropriately titled “How to Paint Everything” we’ve got schemes and recipes for 100s of models. They all, however, assume you know the difference between wet blending and glazing or what the hell “zenithal” means. Welcome to Hobby 101. […]
title: Hobby 101: Kitbashing/Converting

description: With Pariah Nexus packs now landing on doorsteps around the globe, I’m hoping this is Leviathan’s true final outing, and that next week we’ll have hot news from the Pariah Nexus to share. Because of that, and because Shadow of the Erdtree isn’t going to play itself, we’ve got one more Showdown-less week before (presumably) […]
title: Competitive Innovations in 10th: It’s All Over Bar Da Krumpin’ pt.1

description: The first ever Lorcana Challenge event was held here in my hometown, Atlanta, May 25th and 26th and apparently it went down like gangbusters. I wouldn’t know because I was with my family out at the Grand Canyon, which I can assure you was much more fun than wrestling against the sweats, tryhards, Mr. Suitcases, […]
title: Mikey Mouse Club #26 – How The South Was Won
